title: 2-bedroom in Townhouse just 15 minutes from Manhattan
posting_body: ['Large 2-bedroom apartment available on the 3rd floor of a clean, quiet, owner-occupied townhouse.', 'No smoking of any kind in the unit or on the property.', 'No pets permitted.', 'Apartment is approximately 850 square feet.', 'Walking distance to several grocery stores and laundromats as well as a wide variety of restaurants.', 'The Hub (3rd Avenue/149th Street) is a major commercial area with a wide variety of stores.', 'The apartment is about halfway between two train stations: The 2/5 to 3rd Ave/149th Street and the 4/D to 161st/Yankee Stadium.', 'Metro North station (Melrose) is 2 blocks away.', 'Rent is $2100 a month.', 'Heat and hot water are included.', 'Tenant pays their own ConEd electricity and cooking gas.', 'The apartment will be shown by appointment only on Friday, 8/5, Saturday, 8/6 and Sunday, 8/7.', 'Please email to set up appointment time.', 'Completed application, credit check and background check required.', 'You must provide last 4 paystubs as well as prior landlord references.', 'Apartment is available immediately but move-in date is flexible.']
